review: This is a good product if you're looking to take advantage of Amazon Prime instant videos on your TV (especially if you don't have a smart TV).  I don't want to knock it as a product, but I just think it could have been done a little better.  The interface works well, but can be tasking to navigate through all the options.  The biggest annoyance is the remote it comes with.  It's small and easy to misplace and the buttons seem unresponsive at times requiring multiple presses before the stick seems to get the message.There also seems to be some lag/buffering issues at times with the wireless.  I have a very strong connection as my wireless router is maybe 20 feet away from the Fire Stick, yet there are many occasions where I see buffering that I don't see when compared to using my Netflix app on my Chromecast.  Overall it's a pretty solid device, but could use a better remote and perhaps better internet connectivity.  I'm sure the Amazon Fire TV box probably works much better in those areas, but costs nearly 3 times as much for basically the same services.
